biotools.summary: Flexible, fully Bayesian model for motif discovery consisting of motif, background and alignment modules. It can be customized to different kind of biological applications, e.g. microarray, ChIP-chip, ditag, CAGE data analysis by integrating appropriately chosen features and functionalities.

bioschemas.name: BayesMD
